description: Evaluate Experience, Expertise, Authoritativeness, and Trust signals that influence AI model perception

insights.title: Strong expertise signals detected
insights.description: Your content demonstrates high technical expertise with 89% of articles containing industry-specific terminology and detailed explanations

insights.title: Limited author credibility markers
insights.description: Only 34% of content includes author bios, credentials, or experience indicators

insights.title: Good domain authority
insights.description: Your domain has strong backlink profile from .edu and .gov sources, enhancing authoritativeness

issues.title: Missing author attribution on 66% of content
issues.description: AI models heavily weight content with clear author attribution and credentials. Most of your content lacks this signal

issues.title: Outdated content hurting trust signals
issues.description: 23% of your top-performing pages haven't been updated in over 18 months, signaling potential staleness to AI models

issues.title: Weak social proof integration
issues.description: Limited use of testimonials, case studies, and third-party validation in content

recommendations.title: Implement comprehensive author attribution
recommendations.description: Add detailed author bios with credentials, experience, and social proof to all content
actionItems: Create detailed author profile pages for all contributors
Add schema.org Person markup to author bios
Include author credentials and relevant experience
Link to author social profiles and publications
Display author expertise badges on articles

recommendations.title: Establish content freshness protocol
recommendations.description: Implement quarterly content audits and updates to maintain trust signals
actionItems: Audit all content older than 12 months
Add 'Last Updated' timestamps to all pages
Update statistics and examples with current data
Add editorial review dates to schema markup

recommendations.title: Build authoritative citation network
recommendations.description: Increase citations from and to authoritative sources in your industry
actionItems: Pursue speaking opportunities at industry events
Publish original research and data studies
